tp:mapping.name: Channel_Count_Map
tp:mapping.tp:docstring: A mapping from strings representing channel types to their usage count

property.name: ChannelCount
property.tp:docstring: A dictionary of channel types and their count.

signal.name: StatsChanged
signal.tp:docstring: Emitted when a property in this interface changes.

arg.name: Properties
arg.tp:docstring: A map from property names in this namespace (e.g. Nickname) to values. Properties whose values have not changed SHOULD be omitted, but this need not be done.
